snippet: A carefully worded draft Security Council resolution aims to send Syria to the International Criminal Court while protecting American sensitivities.
abstract: France drafts United Nations Security Council resolution that seeks to refer Syria to the International Criminal Court in The Hague, tailoring it specifically to address American sensitivities.
lead_paragraph: A carefully worded draft Security Council resolution aims to send Syria to the International Criminal Court while protecting American sensitivities.

headline.main: U.N. May Refer Syria Conflict to War Crimes Court
headline.print_headline: U.N. May Refer Conflict to War Crimes Court
